channel.title: Cert on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Cert on TLDRBins

item.title: Openssl
item.description: Show TLS Certificate from HTTPS web server echo | openssl s_client -showcerts -servername <TARGET> -connect <TARGET>:443 2>/dev/null | openssl x509 -inform pem -noout -text Certificate Show content of a request openssl req -in request.csr -noout -text Create Client Certificate # Generate a user key openssl genrsa -out username.key 2048 # Create a CSR openssl req -new -key username.key -out username.csr # Settings +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | You are about to be asked to enter information that will be incorporated | | into your certificate request.
